item.title: Script for Grenton roller shutters
item.description: Warning! The Grenton CLU does not validate scripts. Lua is not a strongly typed language, and many issues in scripts only surface at runtime. The CLU may enter emergency mode if an error in the script is encountered during execution. In such cases, you should fix the script or restore a previously working configuration. I recommend making a backup of your project before uploading complex scripts and making or applying changes to scripts incrementally.
